description.value: ValueSet IMMZD2DTDTPOnTimeStart for IMMZ.D2.DT.DTP.On-time start. Business rule: Determine if the client is due for a diphtheria–tetanus–pertussis (DTP) vaccination according to the national immunization schedule Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any Table: DTP vaccination schedule, on-time start (at ≤ 12 months of age)
